item.title: Securing the Browser Era - From Cloud to AI: A blog series on protecting the modern workspace
item.description: The browser has quietly become the universal workspace. What started as a simple tool for accessing the internet has transformed into the central hub for enterprise productivity, collaboration, and now—AI-powered workflows. From cloud applications and SaaS platforms to GenAI copilots running inside browser tabs, the browser is where work is increasingly happening. As the browser’s role has expanded, so has its exposure to risk.
